Welcome to new version of True iService ! The extraordinary self-service experience for True customers.

With the new True iService, you can enjoy

- New Application Interface
- Pay bill, Top up and Buy Extra Package without logging into the app
- Change Postpaid TMH Price Plan to match with your usage
- Buy Extra Package from True Visions
- Get a smart support from True Care Chat

In this release, we offer you a quick, easy and secure way for TrueMove H users by allowing to submit the promise to pay service through True iService or choose to unblock your suspended number by doing the partial payment.

In this release, we made it easier for to you help your friends. When you pay or top up for others, we will record the last 5 people you've paid for, so you won't have to retype their numbers the second time.

In this release, we offer you a quick, easy and secured way of payment for your online purchase from App Store with your TrueMove H number. You can also track all the details of your purchase in the app.  And we've improved the overall app performance.

• We now accept bill payment and top up from TrueMoney Wallet
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

In this release, we've added a new way for you to earn rewards by inviting your friend to use our app. We've also include push notification so you won't miss account updates. The app efficiency has improved for best experience.

In this release, we offer you a quick, easy and secure way to view the True Visions set-top box details and purchase any extra packages from True Visions with redeeming discounts through TrueMove H number.

In this release, International Roaming is ready for the seamless experience when travelling abroad. True iService will support the new color of TrueYou Member Card and 5G enable through application experience is coming shortly.

In this release, International Roaming is ready for the seamless experience when travelling abroad. True iService will support the new color of TrueYou Member Card and 5G enable through application experience is coming shortly.

In this release, international roaming extra package is available for purchase. We’ve also added a way for you to choose the type of notification messages you want to see from news & updates, promotion, and payment due date.

In this release, international roaming extra package is available for purchase. We’ve also added a way for you to choose the type of notification messages you want to see from news & updates, promotion, and payment due date.

In this release, we've added a way for you to enable 5G for your mobile phone. We've also made it easier for you to check which TrueShop is open or closed and where True Shop in 7-Eleven is located. Also, extra package for calling abroad is available for purchase.

In this release, we've added a way for you to enable 5G for your mobile phone. We've also made it easier for you to check which TrueShop is open or closed and where True Shop in 7-Eleven is located. Also, extra package for calling abroad is available for purchase.

In this release, we recommend the package that suits you best based on your usage when you want to change package. We've also let you view your usage and out of package details from "Bills & Usage" menu. Video tutorial to solve home internet problem is also added so that you can follow the simple steps to fix it. In addition, you can check the office hours of True Shop and True Shop in 7-Eleven. Also, we have improved the overall performance of the app.

In this release, lets you buy apps, music, movies and contents from your mobile phone number by Pay with TrueMove H service is available on Online Store. Plus, you can inactive this payment method when you don't make any purchase.

In this release, lets you buy apps, music, movies and contents from your mobile phone number by Pay with TrueMove H service is available on Online Store. Plus, you can inactive this payment method when you don't make any purchase.
In this release, a new way of payment is added allowing you to pay True bills by credit/debit card linked with your TrueMoney Wallet account.
In this release, a new way of payment is added allowing you to pay True bills by credit/debit card linked with your TrueMoney Wallet account.
In this release, we offer an easy way for you to manage inbox notification preferences. You can select what information you want or don't want to receive yourself.
In this release, we offer an easy way for you to manage inbox notification preferences. You can select what information you want or don't want to receive yourself.
In this release, we've improved the overall app performance.
In this release, we've improved the overall app performance.

In this release, you can update your contact address on iService app to make sure that you won't miss any special offers, discount and promotion. In case of service suspension and you may need more time to pay, we offer you a way to request for late payment and remove the service restriction temporarily.

In this release, you can update your contact address on iService app to make sure that you won't miss any special offers, discount and promotion. In case of service suspension and you may need more time to pay, we offer you a way to request for late payment and remove the service restriction temporarily.
In this release, we've improved the overall app performance.
In this release, we've improved the overall app performance.

In this release, we've added more menus assisting you to manage your account conveniently. You can cancel unwanted ads & promotion SMS yourself anytime without any difficulties. Also, we provide video tutorial for first-time user to get more familiar with our service.

In this release, we've added more menus assisting you to manage your account conveniently. You can cancel unwanted ads & promotion SMS yourself anytime without any difficulties. Also, we provide video tutorial for first-time user to get more familiar with our service.

In this release, we have offered you a new way to subscribe home internet from app, and improved the performance of True Care on troubleshooting and fixing the internet problem. You can also check international roaming rate and buy roaming package, personalise your ringback tone and stay entertained watching your favourite contents from TrueID via iService.

In this release, we have offered you a new way to subscribe home internet from app, and improved the performance of True Care on troubleshooting and fixing the internet problem. You can also check international roaming rate and buy roaming package, personalise your ringback tone and stay entertained watching your favourite contents from TrueID via iService.

In this release, we offer free 5GB mobile data for first time login on iService app.
We also made it easier for you to change the language on your bills (Thai or English) at your fingertips.

TrueiService gives away 20 TruePoint to customers who pay True bills via app for the first time!

In this release, you can easily change the language of SMS received from True (Thai or English) yourself. You will get notified when data is nearly used up or being used on the reduced speed. Further, we've recommended the extra package that suits you most ensuring that you can always use data on the max speed continually.

TrueiService gives away 20 TruePoint to customers who pay True bills via app for the first time!

In this release, you can easily change the language of SMS received from True (Thai or English) yourself. You will get notified when data is nearly used up or being used on the reduced speed. Further, we've recommended the extra package that suits you most ensuring that you can always use data on the max speed continually.
In this release, you can conveniently stop the auto renewal and cancel the postpaid extra package at your fingertips Also, we offer best value extra packages and deals for prepaid customers.
In this release, you can conveniently stop the auto renewal and cancel the postpaid extra package at your fingertips Also, we offer best value extra packages and deals for prepaid customers.

In this release, with our Search tab available on iService app, you can easily find menus you would like to use on the app. Also, extra package for both prepaid and postpaid numbers now can be cancelled via iService. Furthermore, we added a convenient way for you to track your home internet repair status through "True Care" anytime.

In this release, with our Search tab available on iService app, you can easily find menus you would like to use on the app. Also, extra package for both prepaid and postpaid numbers now can be cancelled via iService. Furthermore, we added a convenient way for you to track your home internet repair status through "True Care" anytime.
In this release, iService will notify you the new package for your number before the current package expires. The information will be shown in both "Bills & Usage" menu and app notifications.
